Title: Victoria & Abdul
Writer: Lee Hall (screenplay by), Shrabani Basu (based on the book by)
Actors: Judi Dench, Ali Fazal, Tim Pigott-Smith, Eddie Izzard
Plot: Queen Victoria strikes up an unlikely friendship with a young Indian clerk named Abdul Karim.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 11 nominations.
Production: BBC Films, Cross Street Films, Working Title Films
